[{"id":"dev-17415","entityId":"86-22925","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Calendar]Filter category shows only the last checked category"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Lucian Serbaneci"},{"name":"created","value":"1582125872744"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17415"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
Account emailcsilla.bencze@regiondo.com
Supplier ID22901
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 80.0.3987.116 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Categories > create 2 categories with different products in it

Category "Tours"

Category "Tours 2"

  1. Go to calendar » filter by category, adding the 2 categories

Actual result:

Only the offer for last category "Tours 2" selected are displayed in the calendar

Expected result:

All offers of the selected categories should be visible in the calendar.
For example the offers of the "tours " category are missing and should be visible.

URLhttps://hirsch-sprung.regiondo.de/mtb-fahrtechniktraining-in-kirchzarten
Product ID70480
Account emailbjoern.fuenfgeld@hirsch-sprung.com

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Pick an offer with not much appointments in the future, e.g. https://hirsch-sprung.regiondo.de/mtb-fahrtechniktraining-in-kirchzarten
  2. go to future month

Actual result:

User clicks on next months hoping to find an appointment

November

December

etc.

Expected result:

Explain to the user that there are no more appointments bookable online

Copy

EN
Sorry, there is no online availability starting from June 2023.
Please call us at XXX.

FR
Désolé, il n'y a pas de disponibilité en ligne à partir de juin 2023.
Veuillez nous appeler au XXX.

DE
Es gibt leider keine Online-Verfügbarkeit ab Juni 2023.
Bitte rufen Sie uns an unter XXX.

No Upcoming Date Available V05.png","id":"89-59846","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/16123%20No%20Upcoming%20Date%20Available%20V05.png?file=89-59846&c=true"},{"value":"16123 [Booking available.sketch","id":"89-59847","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/16123%20%5BBooking%20widget%5D%20No%20upcoming%20date%20available.sketch?file=89-59847&c=true"},{"value":"image1583239836242.png","id":"89-67179","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1583239836242.png?file=89-67179&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-60004","author":"a.bugaichuk","authorFullName":"Andrii Bugaichuk","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Yann Maurer

  1. For me text "Sorry, there is no online availability for June 2023." does not correspond to the requirement "there are no more appointments bookable online". The word "for" in the message means exactely the same that empty calendar for the current month and gives no additional information about the future availability. Probably we should use something like "Sorry, there is no online availability starting from June 2023."
  2. Should we fix the behavior when "Time" line and quantity selector remain when customer switches to month without any appointment?
  3. How to open 16123 [Booking widget] No upcoming date available (1).sketch attachment?

P.S. For such cases we should suggest to client to not use calendar representation but drop-down or disable possibility to select it on preview phase with some explanation.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563353290218,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60009","author":"g.horvath","authorFullName":"György Horváth","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Andrii Bugaichuk
1.) Agree, if we don't have any appointment later.
2.) I would agree, it would look better, but I think it's unnecessary dev cost. Our users probably won't get to see it. As they would stop reading/looking at the phone number.
3.) Open the png file or download the app here: https://www.sketch.com/. Or please use the following. Text= Roboto, 19, Bold. Border size = size of the calendar. Border color: color of past days.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563355697224,"updated":1563355936904,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60059","author":"y.maurer","authorFullName":"Yann Maurer","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Andrii Bugaichuk
The reality is that often supplier pre-fill appointments for a longer period of time (eventually 12 months) but forget to populate new availbilites when the end of the season approaches, so suggesting a drop-down would not help

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563382138879,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65292","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
Please take a look if it is possible to return me last available appoinment date.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1580222974421,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65502","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Sergey Chorny, you can find first and last available appointment date in the 'range_available' item in the calendar data.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1580977772878,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65827","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
Check please code, it returns null instead of dates in range.

@Alexander Bechte
I've done what is requested in this ticket, however it is technically difficult to follow this design, and show text over calendar. Also, as we have multiple calendars, I see only option to show this text below calendar. Once Maxim fix his part, check please on testing, and provide feedbacks.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582015415328,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65836","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Sergey Chorny, sorry it was a testing code leftover, removed it. Please check again.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582018005177,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65847","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Naomi
Please test this one on testing.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582028875214,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-65848","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Logic is:
When you click prev month on calendar - you can't switch to the month earlier than first available date.
When you click next month on calendar - if you switch to month later than last available date, and this month has no dates, the "sorry" text should appear.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582029597479,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66351","author":"Naomi","authorFullName":"Naomi","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on test with operators bjoern.fuenfgeld@hirsch-sprung.com

Offer id 111573 https://hirsch-sprung.regiondo-test-de.de/mtb-fahrtechnik-kurs-e-bike-trail-in-kirchzarten

With Type: Specific dates/appointments and Availability: 04/18/2020 – 10/10/2020
When opening the ticket shop online the calendar opens to first available month ✔
After reaching the last available month I am still able to search in the calendar future dates although there are no more available dates after 10.10.2020
-> the message is not displayed: ''Sorry, there is any online availability starting from June 2023.
Please call us at XXX.''

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583241425358,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66415","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-16123","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
Please, move range_available from calendar to product request.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583332704288,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17448","entityId":"86-23003","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Booking Widget] Activate booking widget on Reseller Level for testing"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Bechte"},{"name":"created","value":"1582726005296"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17448"},{"name":"description","value":"
[ID]: Currently new booking widget cannot be enabled on Staging without affecting all resellers. Could you please implement the functionality and enable it on Staging. In scope of the ticket QA team will test new booking functionality on Stg.

#### Actual result:
It is currently defined that we are able to activate/deactivate the booking widget functionality globally in magento.



#### Expected result:
It should be possible to enable the new booking widget
1.) Globally (for the final release)
2.) Per Reseller for testing

#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Book the bundle gift and open PDF; (Booking number 1582629619041747100 )
2. Redeem the gift voucher using code and URL from the PDF;


#### Actual result:
1. Redeem gift certificate page does not have info about quantity
2. Black box with Bundle title is clickable without any interaction


#### Expected result:
1. Add quantity to section with offers

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
Product ID116042
Account emailMoen-hhu6p377@gmail.com
Order #1582629619041747100
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

There is a follow up ticket to fix minor issues during implemented flow
Preconditions: 2 offers are created. Bundle of the offers is created with enabled Gift option.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Open ticketshop https://audrey-hhu6p377.regiondo-test-uk.de/ and on the bundle detail page;
  2. Choose "Buy as a gift" tab and Set Quantity to 3 items;
  3. Enable "1 Gift certificate valid for 3 people" option. Add the bundle to cart and open the cart;

Actual result:

A- Gift voucher
1 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
1 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Quantity: 1 × €465.00 instead of 3

B- After adding bundle to cart, popup display
Incredible Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 1
22222 Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 1

Expected result:

A - Gift voucher should be
3 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
3 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Gift voucher
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

B- popup should display
Incredible Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 3
22222 Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 3

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"i.dyachenko"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1583330548966"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-15988","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":{"bg":"#e0f1fb","fg":"#3d85c6"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"BundleGiftQty.png","id":"89-66901","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/BundleGiftQty.png?file=89-66901&c=true"},{"value":"redeemGift.png","id":"89-66902","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/redeemGift.png?file=89-66902&c=true"},{"value":"GiftConfirmation.png","id":"89-66903","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/GiftConfirmation.png?file=89-66903&c=true"},{"value":"image.png","id":"89-66949","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-66949&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-66950","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-66950&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-66412","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17441","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, @Alexander Bechte , @Igor Dyachenko

A- Gift voucher

1 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
1 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

Here the first two rows show how many respective products are in a bundle.
And the third row shows how many gift certificates person is buying.

So if the bundle consists, let's say, from 2 items of product A and 3 items of product B, then it will be:

2 × Product A
3 × Product B
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

If you buy two bundles, the whole purchase would consist of 4 products A and 6 products B.

Please suggest if it is important to show:

  • Quantities of products composing one bundle
  • Total quantities of final products purchased
  • Number of gift certificates.

As an example please consider the following use cases:
Bundle:

  • 2 × Product A

  • 3 × Product B

  • I am buying 2 bundles as 1 gift certificate.

  • I am buying 2 bundles as 2 gift certificates.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583324635776,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17370","entityId":"86-22816","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Calendar][Resource view] Resources are not all shown for every user even though connected to offers"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Aline Morgenstern"},{"name":"created","value":"1581436611412"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17370"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
resources affectedInflate, Sprungbereich
Account emailinfo@maxxarena.de
Supplier ID18047
Novomind Ticket ID81170
Environmentall browsers

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Log in to bernhard@maxxarena.com

  2. Go to resource manager and check number of resources. There are 6 resources.
    ->

  3. Check if all resources are connected to offers.
    -> all resources are connected to offers

  4. Go to Calendar > Resource view

Actual result:

Some users of this supplier ID cannot see some of the resources in resource view while others can see all of them.

Userresource not shown
info@maxxarena.de-
adam@estermanns.com-
bernhard@maxxarena.comInflate
christina@estermanns.com-
daniel@estermanns.com-
franziska@estermanns.comInflate
herbert@estermanns.com-
julian@estermanns.com-
layla@estermanns.com-
marinus@estermanns.comSprungbereich
rico@clubdrei.com-
simone@estermanns.com-
staff@maxxarena.com-
vivian@estermanns.com-

example info@maxxarena.de where everything works

example bernhard@maxxarena.com where the resource "Inflate" is not shown

Info: we tried to reproduce but weren't able to reproduce on other accounts.
Missing resources can still be accessed manually via filter.
After adding all resources to filter, and afterwards delete one resource from filter, resource "Inflatable" is shown in resource table (see Screencast)

Expected result:

All resources should be shown per default in resource view in all user accounts when they are connected to at least one offer. E.g.

{"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
